post.p: Questions/NNS on/IN Stack/NNP Overflow/NNP are/VBP expected/VBN to/TO relate/VB to/TO programming/NN within/IN the/DT scope/NN defined/VBD by/IN the/DT community/NN ./. Consider/VBP editing/VBG the/DT question/NN or/CC leaving/VBG comments/NNS for/IN improvement/NN if/IN you/PRP believe/VBP the/DT question/NN can/MD be/VB reworded/VBN to/TO fit/VB within/IN the/DT scope/NN ./. If/IN this/DT question/NN can/MD be/VB reworded/VBN to/TO fit/VB the/DT rules/NNS in/IN the/DT help/NN center/NN ,/, please/VBZ edit/VB the/DT question/NN ./.

In/IN practice/NN ,/, the/DT most/JJS common/JJ reason/NN for/IN this/DT happening/VBG seems/VBZ to/TO be/VB that/WDT the/DT ./COS rnd/COS file/NN in/IN your/PRP$ home/NN directory/NN is/VBZ owned/VBN by/IN root/NN rather/RB than/IN your/PRP$ account/NN ./. The/DT quick/JJ fix/NN :/:
sudo/COS rm/COS ~/COS //COS .COS rnd/COS For/IN more/JJR information/NN ,/, here/RB 's/VBZ the/DT entry/NN from/IN the/DT OpenSSL/COS FAQ/ACR :/:
Sometimes/RB the/DT openssl/COS command/NN line/NN utility/NN does/VBZ not/RB abort/VB with/IN a/DT "/" PRNG/COS not/COS seeded/COS "/" error/NN message/NN ,/, but/CC complains/VBZ that/WDT it/PRP is/VBZ "/" unable/COS to/COS write/COS '/COS random/COS state/COS '/COS "/" ./. This/DT message/NN refers/VBZ to/TO the/DT default/JJ seeding/NN file/NN (/( see/VBP previous/JJ answer/NN )/) ./. A/DT possible/JJ reason/NN is/VBZ that/WDT no/DT default/JJ filename/NN is/VBZ known/VBN because/IN neither/CC RANDFILE/COS nor/CC HOME/COS is/VBZ set/NN ./. (/( Versions/NNS up/RP to/TO 0/CD ./. 9/CD ./. 6/CD used/JJ file/NN "/" ./. rnd/COS "/" in/IN the/DT current/JJ directory/NN in/IN this/DT case/NN ,/, but/CC this/DT has/VBZ changed/VBN with/IN 0/CD ./. 9/CD ./. 6/CD a/FW ./. )/) So/IN I/PRP would/MD check/VB RANDFILE/COS ,/, HOME/COS ,/, and/CC permissions/NNS to/TO write/VB to/TO those/DT places/NNS in/IN the/DT filesystem/NN ./.
If/IN everything/NN seems/VBZ to/TO be/VB in/IN order/NN ,/, you/PRP could/MD try/VB running/VBG with/IN strace/NNP and/CC see/VBP what/WP exactly/RB is/VBZ going/VBG on/RP ./.

My/PRP$ system/NN was/VBD giving/VBG me/PRP this/DT issue/NN because/IN the/DT "/" ./. rnd/COS "/" file/NN was/VBD owned/VBN by/IN root/NN rather/RB than/IN my/PRP$ user/NN ./. A/DT quick/JJ sudo/COS chown/COS user/COS :/COS user/COS ~/COS //COS ./COS rnd/COS made/VBD everything/NN work/VB out/RP ./.

But/CC why/WRB do/VB I/PRP still/MD have/VB a/DT ./COS rnd/COS directory/NN iwned/VBD by/IN root/NN in/IN my/PRP$ $/COS HOME/COS after/IN I/PRP create/VBP a/DT self-signed/JJ certificate/NN ?/.

Yes/UH ,/, if/IN you/PRP run/VBP from/IN php/COS web/NN server/NN ,/, the/DT user/NN is/VBZ www-data/COS ,/, and/CC you/PRP should/MD add/VB "/" export/COS "/" before/IN every/DT openssl/COB :/COB shell_exec/COB (/COB '/COB export/COB RANDFILE/COB =/COB "/COB ./COB rnd/COB "/COB ;/COB openssl/COB ecparam/COB -/COB genkey/COB -/COB name/COB secp256k1/COB '/COB )/COB )/COB

Being/VBG an/DT administrator/NN on/IN the/DT machine/NN and/CC using/VBG "/" Run/COS As/COS Administrator/COS "/" are/VBP different/JJ ./. "/" Run/COS As/COS Administrator/COS "/" forces/VBZ the/DT program/NN to/TO run/VB as/IN an/DT Administrator/NN ,/, otherwise/RB even/RB when/WRB you/PRP are/VBP an/DT administrator/NN ,/, the/DT prompt/NN will/MD run/VB with/IN a/DT non-administrator/NN security/NN clearance/NN ./.
Great/UH Beachhouse/NNP Thanks/VBZ ,/, It/PRP 's/VBZ work/VB for/IN me/PRP
